subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Demetris Nichols had a career-high 37 points, 26 in the second half, and matched his career best with 10 rebounds yesterday to help Syracuse (17-8, 6-5 Big East) get past visiting St. John’s, 76-74.
snippet: Demetris Nichols had a career-high 37 points, 26 in the second half, and matched his career best with 10 rebounds yesterday to help Syracuse (17-8, 6-5 Big East) get past visiting St. John’s, 76-74.
